synopsis.text: Sasaki and Miyano are a high school couple navigating the final months before Sasaki's graduation. Having confessed their feelings a year prior, their relationship is still fresh and they are learning to understand each other's desires and emotional needs. As the school year draws to a close, Sasaki faces pressure from upcoming university entrance exams while also longing to spend more time with Miyano. The couple celebrates Valentine's Day together for the first time and contemplates how to reveal their relationship to family. While graduation signifies the end of their high school days, Sasaki and Miyano are committed to facing future challenges side-by-side with open communication and compassion. Their bond continues to deepen through life's transitions from adolescence into adulthood.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
